title: Finally Home
description: ♥ Welcome to Hayden Falls, Montana ♥ "If I had known joining the Army would have cost me her, I never would have enlisted." Aaron Bailey's decision to join the Army to give his future family a better start turns out to be the first of a long list of mistakes. Returning home is his latest mistake until he looks into a set of blue eyes. Not just any blue eyes, but sapphire Bailey blue eyes. Somebody has some explaining to do. Kennedy Reed's ex-boyfriend finally returns to Hayden Falls. The lie that was supposed to protect her is about to be exposed. Lies are revealed. Tempers flair. Emotions rise. Will Aaron and Kennedy find a way through it all to finally have the future they planned? Or was ten years too long, and the pain too much? ♥ Finding Home ~ Hayden Falls ~ Book Seven is a Small-town Military Romance ♥ Get your copy today .
author: Debbie Hyde
